title: Understanding AI: A Human-Centric Approach
image_desc: A stylized graphic depicting a human brain intertwined with circuitry, symbolizing the human element in AI development.
narration: Welcome.  This presentation explores the impact of Artificial Intelligence and emphasizes the importance of human understanding and involvement in its development.

title: AI: More Than Just Sci-Fi
content:
AI is a technology, not just science fiction.
Human decisions drive AI development.
Understanding AI is crucial for everyone.
image_desc: A photo of a diverse group of people collaborating on a project, with computer screens showing code and data visualizations in the background.
narration: AI is a powerful technology, often portrayed as futuristic and uncontrollable.  But it's important to remember that AI is built on human decisions and choices.  Understanding how it works is vital, not just for specialists, but for everyone.

title: The Benefits of Understanding AI
content:
Gain a better understanding of its impact on your life.
Influence the future direction of AI development.
Contribute to a more ethical and inclusive AI future.
image_desc: An image showing interconnected global networks, symbolizing the far-reaching impact of AI.
narration: Understanding AI's workings offers significant benefits. It allows you to better comprehend its influence on your life and the lives of those around you.  It also empowers you to participate in shaping its future, ensuring it's developed responsibly and ethically.

title: AI Needs Diverse Perspectives
content:
**Column 1: The Need**
Empathy and understanding of human experience are crucial.
Diverse perspectives prevent bias and ensure inclusivity.
Addressing the concerns of vulnerable populations is vital.
**Column 2: The Opportunity**
Contribute your unique skills and perspectives.
Shape a future where AI benefits everyone.
Help build a more ethical and just society.
image_desc: A collage of images representing diverse people from different backgrounds and cultures working together.
narration: The development of AI desperately needs diverse perspectives.  Your unique experiences and empathy are invaluable in creating an AI future that is inclusive, beneficial, and addresses the needs of all members of society.  This is an opportunity to contribute your skills and shape a better future for everyone.

title: Get Involved!
content: (No additional content for this slide.  The caption will convey the message.)
image_desc: A vibrant image depicting people of all ages and backgrounds engaging with technology in a positive and collaborative way.
narration: Whether you're a seasoned programmer or simply curious about AI, there are many ways to get involved.  Learn the basics, engage in discussions, and contribute your unique perspective to shape a future where AI benefits all of humanity.  Thank you.
